lyrics.text:
Pea ko hono ‘uhinga
‘O e angahala,
Ko e fai talangata’a,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.

Ko e tui ki he le’o
‘ A e fakahala;
Mo e fai ki he me’a
Na’e fakatapu.

Pea mo’ua ai leva
‘A ‘etau mātu’a,
‘I he’ena angahala,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.

Pea tō ki lalo leva
Hotau tupu’anga
Pea tu’utāmaki, ki he
Mate ‘angaua.

Ko hono ‘uhinga ia,
‘Oku tau tupu ai,
Ko e kau hiamatea
Pea angakovi.
